table.name: vtiger_bom
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_bom` ( `bomid` int NOT NULL, `subject` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8mb3 COLLATE utf8mb3_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `contactid` int DEFAULT NULL, `account_id` int DEFAULT NULL, `pre_tax_total` decimal(25,8) DEFAULT NULL, `s_h_percent` decimal(25,3) DEFAULT NULL, `currency_id` int DEFAULT NULL, `conversion_rate` decimal(10,3) DEFAULT NULL, `compound_taxes_info` text NOT NULL, `total` decimal(25,8) DEFAULT NULL, `subtotal` decimal(27,8) DEFAULT NULL, `adjustment` decimal(25,8) DEFAULT NULL, `salescommission` decimal(25,3) DEFAULT NULL, `exciseduty` decimal(27,8) DEFAULT NULL, `taxtype` varchar(25) DEFAULT NULL, `discount_percent` decimal(25,3) DEFAULT NULL, `discount_amount` decimal(27,8) DEFAULT NULL, `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, `s_h_amount` decimal(25,8) DEFAULT NULL, `qty_multiple` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `atomglobalpricehike` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bomid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3

table.name: vtiger_bomcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_bomcf` ( `bomid` int NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bomid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3
